about_the_game:
CarX Drift Racing Online is a unique drifting simulator, a real drift sandbox for racers of any level!
Driving assist for gamepads and keyboards ensures you'll drift like a pro right away. Steering wheel setups will make you experience your car with the highest level of immersion thanks to our realistic physics model, made in cooperation with the CarX Motorsport team (a regular competitor in RDS GP).

- Improve your skills in single player races or drive with friends or strangers in online rooms
- Compete in Tandem Drifting to secure a spot in the Top 32
- Or chill and have fun in online rooms with no requirements or restrictions
- Detailed car tuning offers very wide range of settings
- Create your unique look with a variety of bodykits, individual parts and liveries
- Share your car setups and liveries in the workshop - or choose there a livery or setup made by other players
- Car-fleet of over 100 units and counting
- Variety of tracks to choose from, city streets, mountain roads of Japan or race tracks around the world
- Supporting player-made tracks

Dive into the world of drifting with friends! Over 100M fans around the world have already downloaded CarX series games!

BEWARE the danger of addiction! You may not want to quit & play for hours. Taking a quick break every 40 minutes is strongly advised.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 4590 or AMD Ryzen3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB (GeForce 950GT / AMD R9 270)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectX® 11
  • VR Support: Any devices supporting SteamVR or Oculus runtime
  • Additional Notes: The application’s stability is not guaranteed on Intel HD Graphics and AMD HD Radeon on-board graphics cards.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ I5-8300H @ 2.30GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 1050GTX 4 Gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectX® 11
  • VR Support: Any devices supporting SteamVR or Oculus runtime
  • Additional Notes: The application’s stability is not guaranteed on Intel HD Graphics and AMD HD Radeon on-board graphics cards.
